mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (title, content, user_id, bar_id, view_count, like_count, comment_count, status, pubtime, updated_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{userId}, #{barId}, #{viewCount}, #{likeCount}, #{commentCount}, #{status}, #{pubtime}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM post WHERE bar_id = #{barId} ORDER BY pubtime DESC
SELECT * FROM post WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY pubtime DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, view_count = #{viewCount}, like_count = #{likeCount}, comment_count = #{commentCount}, status = #{status}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, b.name as barname FROM post p LEFT JOIN bar b ON p.bar_id = b.id ORDER BY p.pubtime DESC
SELECT p.id, p.title, p.comment_count, p.pubtime, b.name AS barName FROM post p LEFT JOIN bar b ON p.bar_id = b.id WHERE p.status = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY p.pubtime DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT p.id, p.title, p.content, p.pubtime, p.comment_count, b.name AS barName FROM post p LEFT JOIN bar b ON p.bar_id = b.id WHERE p.status = 'ACTIVE' AND ( p.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR p.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ) ORDER BY p.pubtime DESC LIMIT #{limit}
